   sphinx-quickstart on Sat Mar  6 18:43:57 2021.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Quantum Computing Project's documentation!
=====================================================

This is an implimentation of Grover's and Shor's algorithms using Quantum Mechanics.

Trial equation:

.. math::

   \frac{ \sum_{t=0}^{N}f(t,k) }{N}

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   Tensor
   State
   Gate
   Circuit
   sparse
   QuantumRegister
